title: While A Journalist Spends Time in Jail For Doing His Duty, An Old, Ailing Man  Even Unable To Even Sip Water & Dies Behind Bars, What happened to Article 21?  Justice  Rekha Sharma
selftext: During the seminar hosted today by Campaign for Judicial Accountability and Reforms (CJAR) at ISIL, Delhi, former Delhi High Court Judge Rekha Sharma lamented that the Supreme Court has lost its credibility in the eyes of the public.
